mapper.select: SELECT RANK() OVER(ORDER BY WIN DESC) playerRank, NAME, NICKNAME, TEAM_ID, WIN+LOSE match, WIN, LOSE, WIN/NULLIF((WIN+LOSE),0) * 100 winrate, KILL, DEATH, ASSIST, FUNC_PLAYERKDA(NICKNAME) kda FROM PLAYER

SELECT P.TEAM_ID playerId, P.NAME name, T.NAME teamId, P.NICKNAME nickname, P.WIN WIN, P.LOSE lose, P.KILL kill, P.DEATH death, P.ASSIST assist, FUNC_PLAYERKDA('${nickname}') kda FROM PLAYER P JOIN TEAM T ON P.TEAM_ID = T.TEAM_ID WHERE P.NICKNAME = #{nickname}

SELECT MATCHDATE, MATCHNAME, MATCHINFO, BLUETEAMNAME, BLUEGAMER3, REDGAMER3, GAME_ID, BLUERESULT, BLUEPICK3_KILL, BLUEPICK3_DEATH, BLUEPICK3_ASSIST, BLUEPICK3, BLUEPICK3_SPELL1, BLUEPICK3_SPELL2 FROM INGAME I JOIN PLAYER P ON P.TEAM_ID = I.BLUETEAMNAME WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLAYER(PLAYER_ID, NICKNAME, NAME, LINE, TEAM_ID) VALUES(PLAYER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{line}, #{teamId})
mapper.update: UPDATE PLAYER SET WIN = #{win} , LOSE = #{lose} , KILL = #{kill} , DEATH = #{death} , ASSIST = #{assist} WHERE NICKNAME = #{nickname}
